resourceTemplates.name: user-details-by-id
resourceTemplates.title: User details by ID (rich)
resourceTemplates.description: Full profile + manager via $expand, including sign-in activity and on-prem extension attributes (beta).

resourceTemplates.name: user-details-by-upn
resourceTemplates.title: User details by UPN
resourceTemplates.description: Same as details-by-id, addressed by UPN.

resourceTemplates.name: users-by-department
resourceTemplates.title: Users by department
resourceTemplates.description: Filter users by exact department (case-sensitive match).

resourceTemplates.name: users-by-displayname-prefix
resourceTemplates.title: Users by display name prefix
resourceTemplates.description: Prefix search on displayName using startswith().

resourceTemplates.name: users-by-enabled-state
resourceTemplates.title: Enabled/disabled users
resourceTemplates.description: List users by accountEnabled true/false.

resourceTemplates.name: users-created-since
resourceTemplates.title: Recently created users
resourceTemplates.description: Users created after a given ISO 8601 timestamp (e.g., 2025-07-01T00:00:00Z).

resourceTemplates.name: user-manager
resourceTemplates.title: User’s manager
resourceTemplates.description: Get a user’s manager object.

resourceTemplates.name: user-direct-reports
resourceTemplates.title: User’s direct reports
resourceTemplates.description: List direct reports for a user.

resourceTemplates.name: user-member-of
resourceTemplates.title: User’s memberships (groups/dirs)
resourceTemplates.description: Immediate directory memberships.

resourceTemplates.name: user-transitive-member-of
resourceTemplates.title: User’s transitive memberships
resourceTemplates.description: All nested memberships (useful for effective access checks).

resourceTemplates.name: user-license-details
resourceTemplates.title: User license details
resourceTemplates.description: Assigned SKUs and service plans per user.

resourceTemplates.name: user-approle-assignments
resourceTemplates.title: User app role assignments
resourceTemplates.description: Enterprise app role assignments granted to the user.

resourceTemplates.name: user-registered-devices
resourceTemplates.title: Registered devices
resourceTemplates.description: Devices registered to the user (incl. last sign-in approx).

resourceTemplates.name: user-owned-devices
resourceTemplates.title: Owned devices
resourceTemplates.description: Devices owned by the user.

resourceTemplates.name: user-photo-metadata
resourceTemplates.title: User photo (metadata)
resourceTemplates.description: Photo dimensions and id; use the $value endpoint for the binary.

resourceTemplates.name: user-photo-48
resourceTemplates.title: User photo 48x48 (binary)
resourceTemplates.description: Small user photo content stream.

resourceTemplates.name: user-presence
resourceTemplates.title: User presence
resourceTemplates.description: Current presence (availability/activity). Requires appropriate permissions.

resourceTemplates.name: user-mailbox-settings
resourceTemplates.title: Mailbox settings
resourceTemplates.description: Time zone, language, automatic replies, etc.

resourceTemplates.name: user-onedrive
resourceTemplates.title: User OneDrive
resourceTemplates.description: OneDrive info including quota and owner.

resourceTemplates.name: user-joined-teams
resourceTemplates.title: Joined Teams
resourceTemplates.description: Microsoft Teams a user is a member of.
